content: Governing body of handball in Singapore The **Handball Federation Singapore** (**HFS**) is the administrative and controlling body for [handball](/wiki/Handball) and [beach handball](/wiki/Beach_handball) in [Republic of Singapore](/wiki/Republic_of_Singapore). Founded in 2008, HFS is a member of [Asian Handball Federation](/wiki/Asian_Handball_Federation) (AHF) and the [International Handball Federation](/wiki/International_Handball_Federation) (IHF). ## National teams - [Singapore men's national handball team](/wiki/Singapore_men%27s_national_handball_team) - [Singapore women's national handball team](/wiki/Singapore_women%27s_national_handball_team) - Singapore national beach handball team - [Singapore women's national beach handball team](/wiki/Singapore_women%27s_national_beach_handball_team) - Official website (in English) - Singapore at the IHF website. - Singapore at the AHF website. title: Handball Federation Singapore
